Lyric:
[by:柴文艺_]
[ti:I Wanna Know]
[ar:Sickick]
[by:柴文艺]
[00:32.57]I know we'er young its time to be wild and free,
[00:36.67]but when I'm with you,
[00:37.69]i see nobody else for me,
[00:40.58]I just can't help but fall down into your gravity,
[00:45.24]tell me if i'm more than just a tease.
[00:47.73](i wanna know... wanna know)
[00:48.96]Scream out my name and i will be there for you,
[00:53.10]just give me a chance to show you my love is true, so true
[00:56.73]let me lift you up high cause i think the world of you,
[01:01.18]I can only hope you feel this too.
[01:03.61](I wanna know I wanna know)
[01:05.33]I wanna know if I could be the one, 
[01:09.68]Would you wanna wake up next to me? Oh...
[01:13.47]I wanna know if you, 
[01:15.66]would stay or run,
[01:17.57]If every night wasn't ecstasy...
[01:21.19]Oh... Oh... Oh... Oh...
[01:53.80]When you talk I'm hearing all the words you're sayin',
[01:57.56]while looking for meaning in between,
[02:01.75]and I might be making all this up, I get it,
[02:05.75]but I know you know what you mean to me...
[02:09.36]You've got a vibe, 
[02:11.52]I'd fuck with 'till I die,
[02:13.48]and you know I ain't go' stop until you're mine.
[02:17.74]My heart is breaking,
[02:19.54]everyday i'm waking,
[02:22.16]to a life without you right here by my side...
[02:25.22](I wanna know, I wanna know...)
[02:26.61]I wanna know if I could be the one, 
[02:31.20]Would you wanna wake up next to me? Oh... 
[02:34.98]I wanna know if you,
[02:37.12]would stay or run, 
[02:39.70]If every night wasn't ecstasy...
